alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 12:10PM CST until November 11 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 16 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Lake Of The Woods and North Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 10 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of over an inch an hour are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami
